name: Gyroglyph
description:
Gyroglyph is a physics-based puzzle game where you control the map, not the player! 

Little Beetle is stuck inside Tutankhamon's treasure. Help Little Beetle to escape from coin to coin and be free again!

Game created by:
- Delunado (Game Design, Programming)
- Raquel Blanco (Art)
- Paco Diago (SFX, Music)
